subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Conor Casey’s third goal of the game, a header that beat Jon Conway in the 90th minute, gave the Colorado Rapids a 5-4 victory over the Red Bulls in an M.L.S. game in East Rutherford, N.J. Mike Magee, Juan Pablo Ángel and Dane Richards scored in the first half for the Red Bulls (9-9-8). Colorado (10-12-4) led, 4-3, at halftime.
